summary: A cripple takes revenge on criminals by using a magic spell that transforms him into an oily monster/superhero.
cast: Danny Lee|Ping Chen|Lily Li|Lun Hua|Hsieh Wang|Angela Yu Chien|Feng Ku|Hung Wei|Shih-Ou Chang|Shao-Chia Chen|Ti-Ko Chen|Tien Lung Chen|Chok-Chow Cheung|Chuen Chiang|Han Chiang|Yang Chiang|Chun Chin|Tien-Chu Chin|Alan Chung San Chui|Hsia Hsu|Pei-Chi Huang|Ling-Ling Hung|Hsiung Kao|Chun Fai Lau|Chiu Lee|Sau-Kei Lee|Feng Lin|Wen-Wei Lin|Han Ling|Hui-Ling Liu|Terry Liu|Tsun Liu|Chiang Lo|Jack Long|Jen-Ching Mi|Min Min|Fat Tsui|Yung-Liang Tu|Lin Tung|Ai-Ti Wan|Han Chen Wang|Mei Wong|Yuan-Shun Wu|Shi-Kwan Yen|Cheung-Yan Yuen|Corey Yuen|Woo-Ping Yuen
title: You gui zi
